Name: Halley's Dream
About the game: Halley's Dream is a beautiful third-person adventure game about a husky dog that woke up in a beautiful fantasy world. He will find that all other animals except one bear are turned into a stone by an evil dragon. Along the way, the player will experience a relaxed, dreamlike atmosphere, solve mysteries, and explore a beautiful world. Beautiful storyline . Various movement mechanics . Gameplay: You will travel through the world by following the beautiful storyline, solve interesting puzzles, learn new abilities by collecting items. Key Features: Beautiful fantasy world with interesting puzzles to solve. Cozy and dreamlike experience. Compelling and memorable storyline. This is a short 1.5 - 2.5h to complete game. Play on your own pace - there is no need to finish the game fast, you are free to explore the world.
